thread.section_title: LaserAway Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of LaserAway | www.laseraway.com | 12 of 22
thread.title: MB

author: MB
title: MB
text: I have had two laser hair removal sessions and both have been very good. I've had a different nurse for each appointment. I'm giving four stars because I felt the nurse for this second treatment did not spend as much time lasering as the last treatment. Which to me means I will not have as much hair eliminated this time. She was however super nice and made me feel comfortable so the experience itself was great.
